posts.entry: We talked about HTML components and how to make grid layouts with Flexbox in CSS.
We started learning the fundamentals of js functions today. It was cool but also a lot of information and my brain hurt.
Today we started our group projects. It's great to work with my classmates. The Github workflow flow charts are the best!
We started learning how to debug js issues. I really liked the trouble-shooting aspect of it. Don't overlook tiny syntax issues.
